decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01, 02, 51-53/00, Design & Access Statement received 23/09/2013 and 51-53/00, 51-53/01, 51-53/02, 51-53/03, 51-53/04, 51-53/05 received 10/08/2012 of the original consent ref. 00099/51-53/P3) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used for worship and yoga exercise and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Removal of condition 4 of planning permission 00099/51-53/P3 dated 10/09/2012 to enable the erection of a mezzanine floor over part of central hall.
